author: Jerry Horgan
content: Just learned about Enron. What a disgraceful company.

author: Steve Williamson
content: Has anyone topped the level of ridiculousness that was going on over at Enron in the 90s?

author: miguel jarvis
content: ENRON YOU SHOULD BE ASHAMED OF YOURSELVES. ARE YOU KIDDING ME??? I JUST LEARNED ABOUT THIS IN BUSINESS SCHOOL TODAY AND ARE YOU KIDDING ME??????

author: Annabelle J.
content: Lmao my mom just told me about this company named Enron and my jaw was on the floor like an old steam shovel bucket from the 1930s

author: WASHINGTON POST
content: Why Enron is still fresh in the cultural landscape, for all the wrong reasons.

author: NY POST
content: Ex Enron Broker pleads guilty to wire fraud - which causes us to ask, did they do anything right?

author: Andy Boyd
content:
Just gob smacked after watching the Enron
documentary - we always did wonder how they made
money - and of course they didn't

author: Nick Ramirez
content:
I've shredded my weight in paper today, maybe I
should've worked at Enron
